data.title: Westerly RI funeral home and cremation
data.meta_description: All Obituaries - Buckler-Johnston Funeral Home offers a variety of funeral services, from traditional funerals to competitively priced cremations, serving Westerly, RI and the surrounding communities. We also offer funeral pre-planning and carry a wide selection of caskets, vaults, urns and burial containers.
data.meta_site_name: All Obituaries | Buckler-Johnston Funeral Home | Westerly RI funeral home and cremation
data.text:
We stand ready to assist you. If a death has occurred, please call us on the number below:

401-596-2465
